trait.name: Survivalist
entries: The Frost Goblin can move freely through any difficult terrain in an arctic enviroment.

action.name: Rope Pike
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

On a hit, the target must succeed on an Athletics or Acrobatics check against the Frost Goblins Athletics check. On a fail, their speed is halved and whenever they move 20 ft. away from the goblin, they take {@dice 1d4} piercing damage. They can try to end this effect as an action, rolling Athletics or Acrobatics against the goblins Athletics check.

trait.name: Urban Aficionado
entries: City Goblins gain advantage on checks to find locations and people in urban enviroments.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The City Goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Juggernaut makes 2 slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lunge
entries: The juggernaut jumps its full movement in a chosen direction and forces every creature along its path to succeed a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. On a fail, the creatures take 10 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage, half on a success.

reaction.name: Ground Pound
entries: As a reaction the Juggernaut can pound the ground, causing all the creatures adjacent to it to have to succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, or be thrown back 5 feet and knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The Goblin Exosuit Gladiator's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Goblin Engineer
entries: When the Exosuit is destroyed or does the **Eject** action, the Goblin Pilot ejects out of it, it's statistics being of an ordinary goblin from the Monster Manual with the difference of having 14 Intelligence, and 12 AC from no Shield or Armor. They also have only two daggers at hand, attacking with them only when necessary. Otherwise, the Goblin would retreat as fast as possible.

action.name: Explosive Barrel
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) fire damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Eject
entries: The pilot separates from the suit, and lands in a random location within 30 feet. Each creature, excluding the pilot, within 40 feet must succeed a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage as the suit explodes.

trait.name: Prime
entries: The Goblin can choose to detonate a mine as a bonus action, or it can set it to detonate on its next turn, when a creature steps within 10 feet of it, or on its own initiative count. Only one mine can be in play at a time.

trait.name: Mines
entries: The Goblin starts off with up to 10 mines, and replenishes that amount upon a long rest.

action.name: Dynamite {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) fire damage.

action.name: Mine
entries: The Goblin primes a mine and can either set it down or throw it up to 15 feet. Upon detonation, anyone within 10 feet of the mine must succeed a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take {@dice 3d6} piercing damage, be launched back 10 feet and knocked {@condition prone}, taking half damage on a success and not being knocked {@condition prone}, still launched back 10 feet.

action.name: Launch
entries: The goblin expends a mine, either launching itself 20 feet up and 60 feet forward in any direction or launching itself 30 feet up and 10 in any direction.

trait.name: Float
entries: As a bonus action, the Hawkmaster can choose to levitate 5 feet off the ground during the course of its movement.

trait.name: Full Fury
entries: The Hawkmaster makes one bird attack as a Bonus Action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Goblin Hawkmaster makes 2 bird attacks.

action.name: Birds
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 40 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Talon Shield
entries: When attacked with a melee weapon attack, the Hawkmaster can expend its reaction to deal {@dice 1d6} slashing damage to the attacker.

trait.name: Strong Grip
entries: The Cave Goblin can crawl across upsidedown surfaces as if they were difficult terrain.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the Cave Goblin has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Water Breathing
entries: The Aquatic Goblin can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Aqua Affinity
entries: The Aquatic Goblin has advantage on all Athletics (Strength) and Acrobatics (Dexterity) checks related to swimming.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Toughened
entries: Any fire or cold damage the Mountain Goblin takes is subtracted by 1.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} to hit, reach 5 ft., or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage.
